TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CspParameters extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含传递给执行加密计算的加密服务提供程序 (CSP) 的参数。

span.span: Contains parameters that are passed to the cryptographic service provider (CSP) that performs cryptographic computations.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示一些参数，你可以将这些参数传递给托管的加密类，这些类在内部使用 microsoft 加密服务提供程序（csp）的非托管的 microsoft 加密 API （CAPI）。The class represents parameters that you can pass to managed cryptography classes that internally use Microsoft Cryptographic Service Providers (CSPs) from the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI). 名称以 "CryptoServiceProvider" 结尾的类是对应 CSP 的托管代码包装。Classes with names ending in "CryptoServiceProvider" are managed code wrappers for the corresponding CSP. 使用类来执行以下操作：Use the class to do the following: - 通过向或属性传递提供程序类型来指定特定 CSP。Specify a particular CSP by passing the provider type to the or property. 还可以使用构造函数的重载来指定 CSP。You can also specify a CSP using an overload of the constructor. - 创建可存储加密密钥的密钥容器。Create a key container where you can store cryptographic keys. 密钥容器提供了持久保存加密密钥并使其免受恶意第三方攻击的最安全方式。Key containers provide the most secure way to persist cryptographic keys and keep them secret from malicious third parties. 有关创建密钥容器的详细信息，请参阅[如何：将非对称密钥存储在密钥容器中](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。For more information about creating key containers, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md). - 使用属性指定是创建非对称签名密钥还是非对称交换密钥。Specify whether to create an asymmetric signature key or an asymmetric exchange key using the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类创建一个密钥容器，并将该密钥保存到容器中。The following code example creates a key container using the class and saves the key in the container. [!code-cpp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CPP/capikey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CS/capikey.cs#1)] [!code-vb[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/VB/capikey.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用类来选择智能卡加密服务提供程序。The following code example uses the class to select a Smart Card Cryptographic Service Provider. 然后，使用智能卡对数据进行签名和验证。It then signs and verifies data using the smart card. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/CPP/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/VB/example.vb#1)]

span.span: Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这种形式的将字段初始化为的`24`值，该值指定 PROV_RSA_AES 提供程序。This form of initializes the field to a value of `24`, which specifies the PROV_RSA_AES provider. 此默认提供程序与算法兼容。This default provider is compatible with the algorithm. 有关其他提供程序类型的信息，请参见字段。For information about other provider types, see the field. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类创建一个密钥容器，并将该密钥保存到容器中。The following code example creates a key container using the class and saves the key in the container. [!code-cpp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CPP/capikey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CS/capikey.cs#1)] [!code-vb[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/VB/capikey.vb#1)]

span.span: Cryptographic Services

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 dwTypeIn) cil managed

param.name: dwTypeIn
param.span: 指定要创建的提供程序类型的提供程序类型代码。

span.span: A provider type code that specifies the kind of provider to create.

summary.span: 使用指定的提供程序类型代码初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified provider type code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数通过传递表示提供程序的数值来指定提供程序类型。Use the constructor to specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents that provider. Wincrypt.h 头文件中定义了表示默认提供程序类型的数值：The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - 若要指定与算法兼容的提供程序，请将`1`值传递给`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `1` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. - 若要指定与算法兼容的提供程序，请将`13`值传递给`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `13` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. 有关其他提供程序类型值的信息，请参见字段。For information about other provider type values, see the field. 有关默认提供程序类型及其行为的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft 加密 API （CAPI）文档。For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类创建一个密钥容器，并将该密钥保存到容器中。The following code example creates a key container using the class and saves the key in the container. [!code-cpp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CPP/capikey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CS/capikey.cs#1)] [!code-vb[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/VB/capikey.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数指定提供程序类型和名称。Use the constructor to specify a provider type and name. 通过传递表示所需提供程序类型的数字值来指定提供程序类型。Specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents the desired provider type. Wincrypt.h 头文件中定义了表示默认提供程序类型的数值：The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - 若要指定与算法兼容的提供程序，请将`1`值传递给`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `1` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. - 若要指定与算法兼容的提供程序，请将`13`值传递给`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `13` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. 有关其他提供程序类型值的信息，请参见字段。For information about other provider type values, see the field. 有关默认提供程序类型及其行为的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft 加密 API （CAPI）文档。For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来选择智能卡加密服务提供程序。The following code example uses the class to select a Smart Card Cryptographic Service Provider. 然后，使用智能卡对数据进行签名和验证。It then signs and verifies data using the smart card. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/CPP/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/VB/example.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的提供程序类型代码和名称以及指定的容器名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified provider type code and name, and the specified container name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数指定提供程序类型、提供程序名称和容器名称。Use the constructor to specify a provider type, a provider name, and a container name. 可以使用容器名称检索该容器中的密钥。You can use the container name to retrieve a key within that container. 通过传递表示所需提供程序类型的数字值来指定提供程序类型。Specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents the desired provider type. Wincrypt.h 头文件中定义了表示默认提供程序类型的数值：The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - 若要指定与算法兼容的提供程序，请将`1`值传递给`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `1` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. - 若要指定与算法兼容的提供程序，请将`13`值传递给`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `13` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. 有关其他提供程序类型值的信息，请参见字段。For information about other provider type values, see the field. 有关默认提供程序类型及其行为的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft 加密 API （CAPI）文档。For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library.

Wincrypt.h 头文件中定义了表示默认提供程序类型的数值：The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - 若要指定与算法兼容的提供程序，请将`1`值传递给`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `1` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. - 若要指定与算法兼容的提供程序，请将`13`值传递给`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `13` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. 有关其他提供程序类型值的信息，请参见字段。For information about other provider type values, see the field. 有关默认提供程序类型及其行为的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft 加密 API （CAPI）文档。For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library.

summary.span: 获取或设置表示容器访问权限及审核规则的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a object that represents access rights and audit rules for a container.

value.span: 表示容器访问权限及审核规则的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents access rights and audit rules for a container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定一个对象，该对象管理容器的随机访问控制列表（dacl）和系统访问控制列表（sacl）的创建。 Use the property to specify a object that manages the creation of discretionary access control lists (DACLS) and system access control lists (SACLS) for a container.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Cryptography::CspProviderFlags Flags { System::Security::Cryptography::CspProviderFlags get(); void set(System::Security::Cryptography::CspProviderFlags value); };

summary.span: 表示修改加密服务提供程序 (CSP) 的行为的 的标志。

span.span: Represents the flags for that modify the behavior of the cryptographic service provider (CSP).

value.span: 一个枚举值，或枚举值的按位组合。

span.span: An enumeration value, or a bitwise combination of enumeration values.
Value is not a valid enumeration value.
Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 表示 的密钥容器名称。

span.span: Represents the key container name for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段指定密钥容器的名称。Use the field to specify a name for your key container. 可以使用容器名称检索该容器中的持久性密钥。You can use the container name to retrieve the persisted key within that container. 有关创建密钥容器的详细信息，请参阅[如何：将非对称密钥存储在密钥容器中](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。For more information about creating key containers, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类创建一个密钥容器，并将该密钥保存到容器中。The following code example creates a key container using the class and saves the key in the container. [!code-cpp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CPP/capikey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CS/capikey.cs#1)] [!code-vb[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/VB/capikey.vb#1)]

span.span: Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 指定非对称密钥是作为签名密钥还是交换密钥创建。

span.span: Specifies whether an asymmetric key is created as a signature key or an exchange key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 使用对象 初始化对象时，字段将初始化属性。The field initializes the property when you initialize a object with a object. 交换密钥是一个非对称密钥对，用于加密会话密钥，以便可以安全地存储和与其他用户交换会话密钥。An exchange key is an asymmetric key pair used to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users. 您可以使用值（`1`）来指定交换密钥。You can use the value (`1`) to specify an exchange key. 此值对应于非`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`托管的 Microsoft 加密 API （CAPI）中使用的值。This value corresponds to the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 签名密钥是一个非对称密钥对，用于对数字签名的消息或文件进行身份验证。A signature key is an asymmetric key pair used for authenticating digitally signed messages or files. 您可以使用值（`2`）来指定签名密钥。You can use the value (`2`) to specify a signature key. 此值对应于 CAPI `AT_SIGNATURE`中使用的值。This value corresponds to the `AT_SIGNATURE` value used in CAPI. 默认情况下， 该字段指定一个交换密钥。By default, the field specifies an exchange key. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用枚举为对象指定密钥类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration to specify a key type for an object. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.KeyNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.KeyNumber/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.KeyNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.KeyNumber/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.KeyNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.KeyNumber/VB/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 获取或设置与智能卡密钥相关的密码。

span.span: Gets or sets a password associated with a smart card key.

value.span: 与智能卡密钥相关的密码。

span.span: A password associated with a smart card key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性提供智能卡密钥的密码。Use the property to supply a password for a smart card key. 使用此属性指定密码时，不会向用户显示密码对话框。When you specify a password using this property, a password dialog box will not be presented to the user.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property IntPtr ParentWindowHandle { IntPtr get(); void set(IntPtr value); };
member this.ParentWindowHandle : nativeint with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置智能卡密码对话框的非托管父级窗口的句柄。

span.span: Gets or sets a handle to the unmanaged parent window for a smart card password dialog box.

value.span: 智能卡密码对话框的父级窗口的句柄。

span.span: A handle to the parent window for a smart card password dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定智能卡密码对话框的非托管父窗口的句柄。Use the property to specify a handle to the unmanaged parent window for a smart card password dialog box. 指定使用此属性的句柄时，将向用户显示一个智能卡密码对话框。When you specify a handle using this property, a smart card password dialog box will be presented to the user. 可以通过使用属性显式指定密码来避免显示智能卡密码对话框。You can avoid presenting a smart card password dialog box by explicitly specifying a password by using the property.

summary.span: 表示 的提供程序名称。

span.span: Represents the provider name for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关提供程序名称的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft 加密 API （CAPI）文档。See the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library for details on provider names.

span.span: Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 表示 的提供程序类型代码。

span.span: Represents the provider type code for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段通过传递表示提供程序的数值来指定提供程序类型。Use the field to specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents that provider. Wincrypt.h 头文件中定义了表示默认提供程序类型的数值：The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - 若要指定与类兼容的提供程序，请传递`1`值。To specify a provider compatible with the class, pass a value of `1`. - 若要指定与类兼容的提供程序，请传递`13`值。To specify a provider compatible with the class, pass a value of `13`. 下表列出了在 Wincrypt.h 头文件中定义的提供程序类型及其相应的数值。The following table lists the provider types and their corresponding numeric values defined in the WinCrypt.h header file. |提供程序类型Provider Type|数值Numeric Value| |-------------------|-------------------| |`PROV_RSA_FULL`|11| |`PROV_RSA_SIG`|22| |`PROV_DSS`|33| |`PROV_FORTEZZA`|44| |`PROV_MS_EXCHANGE`|55| |`PROV_SSL`|66| |`PROV_RSA_SCHANNEL`|1212| |`PROV_DSS_DH`|1313| |`PROV_EC_ECDSA_SIG`|1414| |`PROV_EC_ECNRA_SIG`|1515| |`PROV_EC_ECDSA_FULL`|1616| |`PROV_EC_ECNRA_FULL`|1717| |`PROV_DH_SCHANNEL`|1818| |`PROV_SPYRUS_LYNKS`|2020| |`PROV_RNG`|2121| |`PROV_INTEL_SEC`|2222| |`PROV_REPLACE_OWF`|2323| |`PROV_RSA_AES`|2424| 有关默认提供程序类型及其行为的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft 加密 API （CAPI）文档。For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library.

span.span: Cryptographic Services
